item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:7, topic:305890”][quote author=ZeroFreeze link=topic=402104.msg2980143#msg2980143 date=1254570193]
you might want to post this on an iphone dev forum; doubt anyone here knows anything about iphone sdk dev.

so, did you actually buy the iphone sdk?
[/quote]
it’s free to sign up and download if you want to submit apps it costs cash iirc
@unhandled what’s wrong with it? I’m learning so if there’s something wrong say so I can learn[/quote]
the problem is its a shitty language

item.title: iPhone SDK help
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Well im writing iphone apps on my hackint0sh machine, and i’ve come up against an issue, i cant make the keyboard disappear

- (BOOL)textFieldShouldReturn:(UITextField *)theTextField { if (theTextField == textField) { [textField resignFirstResponder]; } return YES; }
this is the method im using to cancel the keyboard is it written wrong?

Read full topic
